displacementText.playerSelf: You take off the Quarian Envirosuit.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s Quarian Envirosuit and tear it off [npc.her] body.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your Quarian Envirosuit and roughly tear it off your body.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s Quarian Envirosuit and roughly tear it off from [npc2.her] body.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the Quarian Envirosuit.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put the Quarian Envirosuit on [npc.name]'s body.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the Quarian Envirosuit onto [npc.her] body.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] puts the Quarian Envirosuit on you.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the Quarian Envirosuit onto your body.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] puts on the Quarian Envirosuit on [npc2.name] body.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the Quarian Envirosuit onto [npc2.name]'s body.

displacementText.playerSelf: You spend some time opening the valves in your Quarian Envirosuit.
displacementText.playerNPC: You spend some time opening the valves on [npc.name]'s Quarian Envirosuit.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name] and start to open the valves in [npc.her] Quarian Envirosuit.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] spends some time opening the valves in [npc.her] Quarian Envirosuit.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] spends some time opening the valves in your Quarian Envirosuit.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of you and starts to open the valves in your Quarian Envirosuit.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] spends some time opening the valves in [npc2.name]'s Quarian Envirosuit.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name] and starts to open the valves in [npc2.name]'s Quarian Envirosuit.

replacementText.playerSelf: You close the valves to your Quarian Envirosuit.
replacementText.playerNPC: You close the valves on [npc.name]'s Quarian Envirosuit.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you close the valves on [npc.her] Quarian Envirosuit.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] closes the valves on her Quarian Envirosuit.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] closes the valves on your Quarian Envirosuit.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] close the valves on your Quarian Envirosuit.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] closes the valves on [npc2.name]'s Quarian Envirosuit.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] grabs hold [npc2.name] and starts to close the valves on [npc2.name]'s Quarian Envirosuit.
